Our project used the following datasets and websites to conduct this analysis:

+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------+
| Name                                                                                     | Link                                                                                                                    | Used for                                                   |
+==========================================================================================+=========================================================================================================================+============================================================+
| Open Street Map (SG-MY-BN)                                                               | [Geofabrikk](https://download.geofabrik.de/asia/malaysia-singapore-brunei.html)                                         | Finding the Street layer, Points of Interest and Buildings |
+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------+
| Master Plan 2019 Subzone Boundary                                                        | [data.gov.sg](https://data.gov.sg/dataset/master-plan-2019-subzone-boundary-no-sea)                                     | Outline                                                    |
+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------+
| Master Plan 2019 Rail Station Layer                                                      | [data.gov.sg](https://data.gov.sg/dataset/master-plan-2019-rail-station-name-layer)                                     |                                                            |
+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------+
| Singapore Residents by Planning Area/Subzone, Single Year of Age and Sex, June 2011-2020 | [singstat.gov.sg](https://www.singstat.gov.sg/find-data/search-by-theme/population/geographic-distribution/latest-data) | Coordinates for MRT lines                                  |
+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------+
